name: Monster Inc. - Scare Island
summary:
Mike and Sulley try to get a job at Monsters, Inc. by going to Scare Island in order to train to become top scarers. 
 
Monsters, Inc. Scream Team (Monsters, Inc. Scare Island in Europe and Monsters Inc. Monster Academy in Japan) is a platform game published by Sony Computer Entertainment for the PlayStation. It is a prequel to Pixar's 2001 film Monsters, Inc. but set after the events of Monsters University (which was released 12 years after the first film)
